GSD.description: ** DISPUTED **  Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in Advanced Guestbook 2.4.2 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the include_path parameter to (1) index.php, (2) addentry.php, or (3) picture.php, a different set of vectors than CVE-2006-5804.  NOTE: this issue has been disputed by third party researchers, stating that the include_path variable is instantiated before use.

NOTE: this issue has been disputed by third party researchers, stating that the include_path variable is instantiated before use.

reference_data.name: 20070123 Re: Advanced Guestbook <=- 2.4.2 (include_path) Remote File Include Vulnerability
20070123 Advanced Guestbook <=- 2.4.2 (include_path) Remote File Include Vulnerability

descriptions.value: Multiple PHP remote file inclusion vulnerabilities in Advanced Guestbook 2.4.2 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a URL in the include_path parameter to (1) index.php, (2) addentry.php, or (3) picture.php, a different set of vectors than CVE-2006-5804.  NOTE: this issue has been disputed by third party researchers, stating that the include_path variable is instantiated before use

** IMPUGNADO ** Múltiples vulnerabilidades PHP de inclusión remota de archivo en Advanced Guestbook 2.4.2 permite a atacantes remotos ejecutar código PHP de su elección a través de una URL en el parámetro include_path en (1) index.php, (2)addentry.php, o (3) picture.php, un grupo diferente de vectores que CVE-2006-5804. NOTA: este asunto ha sido impugnado por un tercer investigador, señalando que la variable include_path está instanciada antes de usarse.
